meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being excessively rational.
meanings.sent1: The hyperrationality of the scientist led to groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes, hyperrationality can hinder creativity and innovation.
meanings.sent3: His hyperrationality was so extreme that he calculated the exact time to take a break.
meanings.sent4: The hyperrationality of the detective allowed him to solve the case in record time.
meanings.sent5: Her hyperrationality was like a superpower in a world of chaos.
